sentences.sentence: US aviation muses, muses avion, avion listedes muses.

sentences.sentence: In this period, avion manufacturing enterprises not only have to complete batch production tasks, but also ready to deal with the new demands of the market at the same time.
sentences.translation: 在这个时期，飞机制造企业既要完成批产任务，同时也要随时应对市场的新需求。
